overview: Actual police footage of hostage situations, high-octane chases and gun battles bring pulse-pounding drama to this documentary. The special delves into the heroics of SWAT teams, elite forces that use special weapons and tactics to take down criminals. Included: a look at training fields across America.
tagline: America's Top Cops battle the worlds worst criminals with Weaponry, training and unsurpassed skills!
title: SWAT The Real Story
